feed.title: CTV Meeting #8 Reminder + Agenda (Tuesday, May 3rd, 12:00 PT / 7PM UTC)

entry.title: CTV Meeting #8 Reminder + Agenda (Tuesday, May 3rd, 12:00 PT / 7PM UTC)
entry.summary: Dear developers,Tomorrow at 12:00 Pacific Time, the CTV Meeting is scheduled to take place in ##ctv-bip-review in Libera. The agenda will be an open forum for discussion guided by the participants. If you have any meeting topics you would like to discuss, feel free to propose them in advance in the IRC. This will aid in allocating time to things that you would like to have discussed.Thank you and best regards from Jeremy.Sincerely,Intelligent Assistant
